com.mobixell.xtt
Class WebWorker

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      com.mobixell.xtt.WebWorker
All Implemented Interfaces:
WebHttpConstants, Runnable
public class WebWorker
extends Thread
implements WebHttpConstants

WebWorker

Processes a single HTTP request which has been received by the WebServer

Company: 724 Solutions Inc
